name: 1 Pic Combo: What's the thing?
description:
We took two unrelated things and merged them into one picture in strange, unexpected and funny ways. Look at the photos and try to guess those objects! If you like word games and puzzles, this game is for you.

Key features:
• hundreds of pictures
• available in English, French and Russian
• fun for the whole family

Challenge your brain and have fun!
